Class DBWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • padsof.db.DBWrapper

extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper object for accesing the database.

    Víctor de Juan Sanz - Guillermo Julián Moreno

      • save

        public <T> com.j256.ormlite.dao.Dao.CreateOrUpdateStatus save(T item)
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                          java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Saves an object in the database, either creating it or updating it.
        Parameters:
        item - Item to save.
        Returns:
        Status indicating the output of the operation.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL error occurred during the operation.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - An exception occurred during the exploration of the object to create necessary related tables.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - The Java Security Manager doesn't allow accessing certain fields of this object.

      • get

        public <T> java.util.List<T> get(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                        java.lang.Object... values)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Query the database with the given filters. The method receives a pair of field names and their values. For example, for a class with a field String name the call to this method with parameters "name", "peter" will return all elements whose field name equals to peter.
        Parameters:
        cls - Class of the queried objects.
        values - Pair of class' field name and its wanted value.
        Returns:
        List of objects who match the query.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
